articles.title: 'Groundbreaking' bionic arm that fuses with user's skeleton and nerves could advance amputee care - Euronews
articles.description: The bionic arm has been working for years, reducing the user’s level of pain. The first person to receive it tells how life changing it has been.
articles.content:
The bionic arm has been working for years, reducing the users level of pain. The first person to receive it tells how life changing it has been.
